Somerville.Stickney-Shepard House: The Stickney-Shepard House is an historic house at 11-13 Remington Street in Cambridge, Massachusetts. The 1-1/2 story Greek Revival double house was built 1846-47 by N. Stickney and S. P. Shepard, and is a well-preserved example of the form. It has a heavy cornice, with corner pilasters, and a full-width front porch supported by plain columns on the corners, and fluted Doric columns in the center.
